patterns.template: How to Move From [STATE_A] to [STATE_B] in [N] Moves
patterns.example: How to Move From Manual to Automated in 5 Steps
5 Principles Every PM Needs for AI Success
5 Steps to Scale Your AI Practice

usage_rules.avoid_repetition: Do not use same pattern more than 2 consecutive times for same user

substitute_placeholders.[FRAMEWORK_NAME]: Use explicit framework name from article
substitute_placeholders.[TOPIC]: Extract from article title or context
substitute_placeholders.[AUDIENCE]: Extract from article or infer (PMs, Engineers, Leaders, etc.)
substitute_placeholders.[ACTION]: Key action verb (Scale, Build, Transform, Master, etc.)
